alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 9:55PM MST until December 25 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST SUNDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Rain changing to snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and falling snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are no longer expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
